name: Aging Room - Small Batch Fortissimo - M19
additionalNotes: The Aging Room M21 Fortissimo measures 5 1/2 x 47 and utilizes a 7 year old Dominican habano wrapper grown in La Canela with fillers from Dominican Republic. Boutique Blend Cigars President Rafael Nodal mentioned that the Aging Room M21 Fortissimo is probably one of the strongest cigars to ever be released by a Dominican Factory. "Fortissimo" is a musical term that means "strong" and that's what you receive when you try the Aging Room M21 Fortissimo. The cigar releases a plethora of flavors of woody and nuttiness with a hint of creamy hints entwine all together.Â
